title: Sort EBIS Partner League Requests Widget by Request Date
custom_steps: Currently, the Partner League Requests widget on EBIS defaults to being sorted by Player Name. Please update to default sort by Request Date.

title: Provide MLBPA with all 2024 Draft Contracts
custom_steps:
On August 2nd, we need to upload all the pdfs of Approved MN UPCs for all players drafted in the 2024 draft into a BOX instance that the MLB PA has access to.



The file names should include EBIS ID and Player Name.



Box Information to come

title: Convert the player profile contracts tab to React
custom_steps:
Convert all widgets on the page to React (contract history, minor league bonus payments, MN Payroll, Pre Arb Bonus Payments, investigation history)

Contract history has filters in the filter popover as well as a level header filter

Contract history has a create new button which allows creation of Add C, Add D, employee contact, mj contract and mn contract

Pre arb bonus payments will only show if the player has records and the user has permission to see MJCs

Investigation history has green text for submitted rows and red text for preliminary investigation requests

Investigation history is also subject to permission and org checks - if the club user is allowed to know the investigation exists, but not its details they will see the message in the modal that the investigation is on file and to contact BOC for results.

Investigations displayed in Investigation history should not link to the actual investigation for a club user

title: Replace temporary clubLogos draft hotfix with longterm solution
custom_steps: We should either start using BAM logos for these, or improve the current solution of applying cache headers at the CDN level.

title: Refactor EBIS - VCL Deliver to avoid potentially ignoring cache headers
custom_steps: This snippet exists to ensure index.html and env.js requests arenâ€™t cached, since those will serve different files after each ui deploy. Our java services currently only set Cache-Control headers to either private or no-cache, and static website assets use the [static-ebis.mlb.com|http://static-ebis.mlb.com/] domain/fastly service with caching, so the snippet works, but could cause unexpected behavior and should be adjusted to only be applied specifically to requests that need it.

title: As an EBIS User, I want to add new Transaction Type criteria in the Advanced Search
custom_steps:
AC:

* After navigating to Advanced Search, when searching under Transactions, add the following options in the dropdown menu for Transaction Type:
** Release from Roster
** Unconditional Release
* Upon users selecting either filter, the system should bring up Transactions that fit the criteria

title: As a user I want to be able to save which columns are hidden on a widget
custom_steps:
There will be a new option to â€˜saveâ€™ the options which are checked for hidden columns under the gear icon for every widget.

When the user saves their selections that will become their new default values for which columns they see when loading that widget.

The selections should be linked to the logged in user and should persist regardless of which browser or computer the user account is signed into.

title: AMT: As a AMT Admin, I want Clubs to be able to create Players form Status Check Countries
custom_steps:
Related to: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/EBISII-21520|https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/EBISII-21520|smart-link] 

AC:

* When a Club attempts to create a prospect from a Status Check country, they are given a blocking message: â€œAn approved Status Check might be required to Register this player.  Please verify with the BOC whether or not a Status Check is required.â€�
* Club and BOC Users will now both have an Ignore & Continue button on this message

title: As a BOC AMT Admin, I want to be notified of a Status Check Player Creation
custom_steps:
Related to: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-1992|https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-1992|smart-link] 

AC:

* When a user creates a player that prompted a Status Check warning, the system will send an email notifying BOC users:

*Subject:* [Org] Status Check Player Created
*Content:* [Player Roster First] [Player Last] was created on [Creation Date] at [Creation Time] by [Org].  This player may require a Status Check.
